actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to engage in a feasibility study of certain water resource developments.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to engage in a study to determine the feasibility of expanding the Guernsey Dam Power Plant in the State of Wyoming.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to engage in a feasibility study of certain water resource developments.
